SummaryEnglish: A Donghua adaptation of the popular mobile game AFK Arena as you've never seen them before.

1.SummaryEnglish: The final round of the "King of Roast" competition is underway at the Noble Tavern. Competing for the title, Rowan and his big bro, Angelo, go head-to-head. The pair start exposing each other's darkest secrets and embarrassing tales.

2.SummaryEnglish: In the eyes of Lucius and Belinda, there is nothing greater in all of existence than the Divine Light. No matter the problems faced, whether it's the cold, darkness, even cockroaches, the Divine Light can resolve every problem.

3.SummaryEnglish: A cozy night in is ruined by the chaos of an unsolvable math question. To avoid disciplinary action from Daimon's teacher, Niru does all he can to solve the problem, but comes up empty-handed.

4.SummaryEnglish: With a mighty roar, the dragon's wings are each pierced, leaving a gaping hole. Through one wing flies Gwyneth's arrow, through the other, bursts Morvus' bullet. Determined to be the one to claim first blood, the pair hold battle.

5.SummaryEnglish: Rosaline has been so busy with her cleaning duties that she's not had a moment to step outside for far too long. Today, her broomstick offers to swap bodies with her. This gives Rosaline a much-needed escape from her chores.

6.SummaryEnglish: Oh no. Dreaf is sick. But on closer inspection, it's not sick, it's pregnant. The critter is skittish and tries to get away, but finds itself forced into a hospital by two burly individuals.

7.SummaryEnglish: Lurking in the shadows, Baden's evil shadow is pushing him to do bad things, but Baden won't be swayed and refuses all day long. But it won't last, as Baden's shadow gets his way the next day doing something incredibly evil.

8.SummaryEnglish: On this day, Fawkes, Raine and Mirael decide to have a picnic in the woods. When taking the wine they packed out of the coffin, Fawkes inadvertently gets his hand stuck. Everyone tries and fails to get the coffin open.

9.SummaryEnglish: On this day, Fawkes, Raine and Mirael decide to have a picnic in the woods. When taking the wine they packed out of the coffin, Fawkes inadvertently gets his hand stuck! Everyone tries and fails to get the coffin open, but Raine has her own novel idea!

10.SummaryEnglish: To help the Graveborn stay in tip-top condition, Daimon decides to gather advice and tricks on how to take care of yourself as an undead. However, after carefully logging and documenting the advice, he suddenly finds himself engulfed by doubts and fear...

11.SummaryEnglish: Mehira runs into a love-torn Theowyn in the forest. Sensing her time to shine, Mehira demonstrates to Theowyn how to ensnare the hearts of men according to her Secrets of a Man-eater guide! But it seems no matter how hard Theowyn tries, all her efforts backfire...
